UtilityParticleSet::ParticleInfo

UtilityParticleSet::ParticleInfo Class Reference

A UtilityParticleSet inner-bean class. More...

#include <UtilityParticleSet.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A UtilityParticleSet inner-bean class.

It contains:

  • Ogre::SceneNode at whicth is attached the particle system
  • float, that contains the particle system's start time
